71553.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n そこにいる災厄の王は 実体ではありません:
The King of Calamity you see there is not
real. It's an illusion created by his magic.

71554.「影を倒さねば その場に掛けられた幻術を\n 解くことは できません。王者のチカ:
The spell cast over this place cannot be broken until his illusion is dispelled. Please use the Sovereign's power to defeat him
once more!

71555.「さすがは 時の王者 <cs_pchero>さま。\n 王者にふさわしい みごと:
The Time Sovereign continues to impress.
It was a splendid battle worthy of a
Sovereign.

71556.「おそらく 災厄の王の実体は\n この奥にいるのでしょう。:
Perhaps the real King of Calamity is back
that way.

71557.「幻術を解くためには 彼のチカラが必要……。\n 私たちが 世告げの姫となったの:
To break this illusion, we need his power...
Everything that drove us to become Princesses
of Prophecy has led to this very moment.

71559.「我らの身に宿りし 王の使者よ。\n 今こそ 道を示してください。:
O great messenger of the King who resides
within us all... Please show us the path
forward.

71560.「災厄の王……今は そう呼ばれる 地獄の王は\n もともと善良な心を持ち この世:
The King of Calamity...now called the King of
Hell, was once a good-hearted champion
who tried bringing peace to this world.

71561.「ですが 誰よりも強く 優しい心を持っていた\n 英雄は 大いなる闇の根源に取り:
But even with the strongest and kindest heart of all, he was engulfed by the Great Source of Darkness and turned into a horrible monster
bent on destroying everything.

71562.「災厄の王が 魔物となる前……\n まだ 正気を保っていた頃の理性……。\n そ:
Before the King of Calamity became a monsterーwhen he still retained his sanity and was in control... That is the true
identity of this young boy.

71563.「王の身体より追放された理性は\n ある目的を果たすために\n 少年の姿となって:
The sanity that was banished from the King's
body took on the form of this boy, and began
to act with a certain purpose.

71564.「その目的とは 闇のチカラに支配された\n 自身の暴走を止めること……。そのため:
That purpose was to stop his own rampage,
controlled by a dark power. For that reason,
he made us Princesses of Prophecy.

71565.「おねえちゃんたち…… ボクを\n ここまで連れてきてくれて ありがとう……。:
Thank you all for bringing me here to this
place...

71566.「私たち 世告げの姫は……\n これから どうすればよいのですか？: What are we all to do now...?

71567.「おねえちゃんたちは もう自由だよ。\n これからは ひとつ願いがかなった世界で:
You are all free now. I want you to live in a
world where each of your wishes have
come true.

71570.「……うん！\n ここから先は ボクが がんばる番だ！: Yeah! I'll take care of things from here!

71571.「……ただ 今度は あなたに\n ひとつ 手伝ってほしい。:
...there's just one thing I need your help
with this time.

71572.「王には ６つの理性があって\n それぞれ 世告げの姫たちに導かれて\n この場:
The King possessed six senses, each guided
by a Princess of Prophecy. They were to be
gathered in this place.

71573.「そして すべての理性が戻ることで\n あの災厄の王を 元の勇敢な王の姿に\n:
And with the return of those senses, the King
of Calamity was able to return to his original
and courageous self.

71574.「だけど ふたりの世告げの姫が殺された時\n ふたつの理性が いっしょに消えてし:
But when two of the Princesses were killed, so
too did those two senses disappear.

71575.「だから 今のボクでは もう王を\n 元に戻してあげることが できない。\n 今:
Because of that, I can no longer return the
King to his original self. The only thing we
can do now is...

71576.「ボクが この場所の幻術を解きます。: I will dispel the illusion here.

71577.「あなたには この先にいる\n 本当の災厄の王を 倒してほしい。:
I want you to defeat the true King of Calamity
that lies ahead.

71578.「本当の災厄の王は さっきの影とは\n 比べものにならないほど強いよ。\n 倒す:
The true King of Calamity is far stronger than
the illusion from before. It may even be
impossible to defeat him.

71579.「でも 戦うしかないんだ……。\n それ以外に この世界を\n 滅びの運命から救:
But we have to fight... It's the only way we
can save this world from destruction.

71581.「幻術が 解かれたことで\n この世界の本当の姿が 現れたのですね……。:
This world's true nature revealed itself when
the illusion was broken, I see...

71582.「<cs_pchero>さま。\n あちらの扉を ご覧ください。:
<cs_pchero>. Please look at that door
over there.

71583.「あの先から まがまがしい邪気を感じます。\n おそらく あの扉は\n 本当の災:
I can sense the evil presence beyond that
door. Perhaps it leads to the true King of
Calamity...

71584.「時の王者である <cs_pchero>さまのチカラで\n どうか 災厄の王を倒:
Please, you must defeat the King of Calamity
with the Time Sovereign's power. Only then
will this world be saved...

71585.「私たちが協力できるのは ここまでのようです。\n 私たちの世界……アストルティ:
This is as far as we'll be able to help you.
For the sake our world and the future of
Astoltia...please protect us all.

71586.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n どうやら それ以上は 無理なようです。:
<cs_pchero>...
It seems this is out of our hands.

71587.「元の勇敢な王に戻すことも この場で倒し\n 消し去ることも できないのならば…:
If we cannot restore him to the courageous
king he once was, or rid of him completely...

71588.「せめて 二度と動けぬように\n 地の底深くに 封印するしかありません。:
Then we have no choice but to seal him deep
within the ground, so that he may never move
again.

71589.「その役目は 私たち……\n 世告げの姫が 果たしましょう。:
That is the role that we, the Princesses of
Prophecy, shall fulfill.

71590.「<cs_pchero>さまが ここに向かわれた後……\n あの少年に頼んで ふ:
After you left for this place... I asked that
boy if he could give back to us our power
as Princesses of Prophecy.

71591.「私たち ４人の世告げの姫のチカラと\n 天使が残した この白星剣の霊力にて\n:
With the power of the four of us, and the sacred power of the Sword of the Stars, left behind by an angel... We'll seal the King of
Calamity deep within this land for good.

71593.「おねえちゃんたちは もう自由だよ。\n これからは ひとつ願いがかなった世界で:
You are all free now. I want you to live in a
world where each of your wishes have
come true.

71594.「ひとつ 願いがかなった世界……。:
A world where each of your wishes has come
true...

71595.「絶望の淵にいた私たちに あの少年は\n 生きる希望を 与えてくれました。:
We had sunk to the depths of despair, but that
boy gave us all hope.

71596.「私たちには それだけで充分。\n 今は 愛すべき このアストルティアを\n 守:
We feel that is enough. Now, our single wish
is to protect our beloved Astoltia.

71597.「これでよいのです。\n 後悔など ありません。:
It's all right.
I have no regrets.

71598.「私の願いは 私の偽りの予言で\n 亡くなった人たちへ 罪滅ぼしをすること。\n:
My wish is to atone for those who died because
of my false prophecy. Now that wish can be
fulfilled.

71599.「<cs_pchero>さまのおかげで\n 大切な思い出を 取り戻すことができま:
Thanks to you, we all have our precious
memories back. We are truly in your debt.

71600.「愛する人が生きる 愛する世界のために\n 我が身を 捧げることができる……。\:
To give oneself for the sake of the world and
people that they cherish so dearly...
Is there no greater wish?

71601.「ありがとうございます。\n すべて <cs_pchero>さまの おかげです。:
All of this was possible because of you,
<cs_pchero>. Thank you.

71602.「……<cs_pchero>さま。\n 最後に これを お渡ししましょう。:
...<cs_pchero>.
I can finally give this to you.

71603.「そのルーラストーンは\n 自分の故郷に帰るための 特別な物。\n 行き先を 書:
The Zoomstone is a special item that allows
you to return to your hometown. It's
destination cannot be rewritten.

71604.「私たちは 故郷を失ってしまいましたが……\n <cs_pchero>さまは ど:
We may have lost our homes...
But I hope that you will never forget
yours.

71605.「これが 私たち世告げの姫の 最後の使命です。:
This is the final duty of we, the Princesses
of Prophecy.

71608.「大いなる闇の根源に 取り込まれる前の\n あなたは 世界の平和のためにチカラを:
Before the Great Source of Darkness engulfed
you, you were a commendable champion
who did everything for the sake of peace...

71609.「ただ怒りに任せて 暴虐の限りを尽くすのは\n あなたも 本意ではないはず……。:
It is not your true intention to go on a
furious rampage of destruction...

71611.「私たちも 永遠に あなたと運命を共にします。: We, too, will share the same fate.

71614.「あたしも 気がついたら ここにいたのよ！\n ロディアおねえちゃんと いっしょ:
I just realized that I'm here, too! I was with
Rhodia, but now I can't find her anywhere!

71615.「もう いやんなっちゃうわ。\n おねえちゃんったら どこ行ったのかしら。:
I'm getting sick of this. I wonder where she
went.

71618.「な…なんでだろう？\n 今 星の声が 聞こえた気がするの。:
W...what? I thought I just heard the stars
talking.

72166.「戻れる……？\n 自由に歩くことのできる世界へ……。:
I can...go back? To a world where I am free
to walk where I please...

79368.「こんな所で寝てたら カゼひくよ。: You'll catch a cold if you sleep here.
